question: Amazonia -1, that is to be launched by the Indian Space Research and Research Organisation (ISRO), is a satellite of which country?
explanation:
The Indian Space Research and Research Organisation (ISRO) is set to launch Brazilâ€™s Amazonia -1 satellite onboard PSLV.
This satellite has been designed, assembled and tested in Brazil and it will be the first Earth Observation satellite. The launch of the PSLV is scheduled to be held next month while the date is to be released by ISRO soon.
